ISSUE.TITLE: Add support for Python 3.6 / Django 1.11 and integrate pipenv
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Besides obviously adding latest python / django to testing pipeline it would be great to have `pipenv` integrated with this repo to simplify testing / development setup. I'm going to leave the old `requirements.txt` way for the sake of people who do not use `pipenv`.
